mapper.select: SELECT a.extno ,b.NAME as operateUserName ,a.StatusName ,a.starttime ,a.endtime ,a.callid FROM ( SELECT a.extno ,a.uid ,b.StatusName ,a.starttime ,a.endtime ,a.callid ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY a.extno ORDER BY starttime DESC ) rownum FROM statrecord a LEFT JOIN StatRecordValue b ON a.STATUS = b.StatusValue WHERE a.endtime IS NULL ) a LEFT JOIN operator b ON a.uid = b.uid WHERE a.rownum = 1 AND a.extno IS NOT NULL
